scripts.dev:api: cd . && . venv/bin/activate && FLASK_PORT=8000 FLASK_HOST=127.0.0.1 python -m flask --app app.main run --host=127.0.0.1 --port=8000
scripts.install:all: python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:smoke: curl -sf http://localhost:5000/health && echo " - Health check passed"
